channel.title: Today at bible study
channel.description:
So today i was bored, and said fuck it. It's wendsday lets go to church.
So i go in and offer to watch the 2nd graders eagle scouts and there like sure sure whatever
We start drawing and the best picture gets a prize we gave to color this in
[IMG]http://i28.tinypic.com/2s0ljsx.jpg[/img]
Would anyone like to explain how i lost to a kid who drew a circle with some stars in it?
Heres mine
[IMG]http://i27.tinypic.com/eu4n88.jpg[/img]
I showed it to the preacher guy and everything. And he looked at me with that look you give stupid people what did i do wrong?
